question:
[Judy] loves cooking for her son. His name is [Lawrence] [Judy] coached her daughter [Alice]'s cheer leading squad. When [Judy]'s son [Lawrence] became interested in joining, she reorganized the team line up to include him. [Gerald]'s mother, [Judy], was disappointed that he failed his math class [Freddie] took his sister [Alice] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Gerald] invited his father [Joseph] and his brother [Freddie] to go on a weekend fishing trip. [Freddie] loves visiting his grandmother [Dana] in Florida. [Joseph] was so proud of his son, [Freddie]. he received a great scholarship to college.
Question: How is [Dana] related to [Gerald]?
